mdRecord.dcterms:title: King Albert I and Vice President Thomas Marshall on the Piazza at Mount Vernon, October 29, 1919
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: National Pictorial News
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Albert I, King of the Belgians, 1875-1934
Elisabeth, Queen, consort of Albert I, King of the Belgians, 1876-1965

mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white photographic print of King Albert I of the Belgians and U. S. Vice President Thomas R. Marshall on the piazza at Mount Vernon. The photographer's stamp appears on the reverse. A handwritten caption (by Harrison Dodge) reads: ' On East Portico - the Queen and Supt. badly focused - the Crown Prince defaced. Splendid picture of King Albert and Marshall, V.P. U.S.!'
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
Piazza
